name: Shopping Spree (Tymus)
description:
You are Dad, coming back home late, but your family asked you to stop by the supermarket to buy some stuff. Unfortunately the store is about to close in a few minutes and you have to get everything in time.

Be careful of guards patrolling the store (they don't like people running around like madmen) and don't buy what you don't need!

Shopping Spree is a game made by Tymus, Chouqi and Coco for Hits Playtime.
